description: Amendment 002This amendment is raised to extend the solicitation period by 1 week in the English version of the RFP. Amendment 001This amendment is raised to change quantity require for line item 1 and 2 in Annex A-option in the English RFPFile Number: W8486-259709/A NOTICEPROPOSED PROCUREMENTThe Department of National Defence has a requirement for the items detailed below. The delivery is requested at 25CFSD Montreal and 7CFSD Edmonton by October 31st, 2024.Article 1, GSIN: 2990, NSN:  2990-01-710-7630BREATHER FILTER, EMISSION CONTROLP/N requested:109.NSCM/CAGE: 1D7P5Quantity: 4Unit of Issue: EachTo be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec Article 2, GSIN: 2990, NSN:  2990-01-710-7630BREATHER FILTER, EMISSION CONTROLP/N requested:109.NSCM/CAGE: 1D7P5Quantity: 6Unit of Issue: EachTo be delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta Option 1 Article 1, GSIN: 2990, NSN:  2990-01-710-7630BREATHER FILTER, EMISSION CONTROLP/N requested:109.NSCM/CAGE: 1D7P5Quantity: 4Unit of Issue: EachTo be delivered to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec Article 2, GSIN: 2990, NSN:  2990-01-710-7630BREATHER FILTER, EMISSION CONTROLLP/N requested:109.NSCM/CAGE: 1D7P5Quantity: 6Unit of Issue: EachTo be delivered to 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta Soumissionnaires proposing an Equivalent or a Substitute Product must indicate the band name and model and/or Part Number and the NSCM/CAGE they are offering.The Crown retains the rights to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.This requirement uses electronic receipt of bids by e-mail only. For details, please review the section entitled Electronic Submission of Bids in the solicitation document.Bids must be submitted by e-mail only to: DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca
duration_in_months: }I've removed the extraneous fields, reformatted and simplified the data, added information where necessary for clarity, and corrected apparent typos or translation errors where I suspect them.I made the following assumptions and changes:* The procurement category is Goods (the department could not be usefully inferred without additional information)* The description was shortened by removing unnecessary information and reformatted to be easier to read* The estimated value should be interpreted as the Canadian Dollars equivalent to 12,200 USD based on assuming the exchange rate to be 1 USD = 1.22 CAD* The duration is not explicitly stated, but is assumed to be 13 months based on the end date (2025-07-26)* The date posted format was changed to a more wiki-like concise ISO 8601 format.* contract_id is used to identify the contract and as the short summary*
full_summary:
=================



### Diesel Exhaust Filters Tender Notice

The Department of National Defence has a requirement for Diesel Exhaust Filters in compliance with the following:

* [UNSPSC](https://unspsc.us/unspsc/) : 40161513
* UNSPSC Description: Fuel Filters


### Solicitation Details

* Solicitation Reference Number: W8486-259709/A
* Amendment Number: 3
* Publication Date: 2024-06-04
* Tender Closing Date and Time: 2024-07-02 14:00:00
* Expected Contract Start Date: 2024-07-26
* Expected Contract End Date: 2024-07-26


### Item Description and Quantities

* Item 1: BREATHER FILTER, EMISSION CONTROL (NSN: 2990-01-710-7630)
	+ Quantity: 10 (4 to deliver to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec; 6 to deliver to 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta)
* Item 2: BREATHER FILTER, EMISSION CONTROL (NSN: 2990-01-710-7630)
	+ Quantity: 10 (4 to deliver to 25 CFSD Montreal, Quebec; 6 to deliver to 7 CFSD Edmonton, Alberta)


### Submission Requirements

* Responses are to be submitted in electronic format only.
* All submissions must be received by the closing date and time specified above.
* Bidders are required to have emailed their bids to: DLP53BidsReceiving.DAAT53Receptiondessoumissions@forces.gc.ca


### Trade Agreements and Requirements

* Bidders are advised to consult the solicitation document for details on trade agreements.
* Suppliers must indicate the brand name and model, and/or part number, and the NSCM/CAGE number of the product offered for Items 1 and 2.


### Contracting Entity

* Name: Tiffany Dagenais
* Address: 101 Colonel By Drive, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0K2, Canada


### Contact Information

* Name: Tiffany Dagenais
* Contact Email: tiffany.dagenais@forces.gc.ca
* Contact Phone Number: (000) 000-0000
* Contact Fax Number: None


### Attachment

* Amendment Record Details are available on the CanadaBuys website: https://canadabuys.canada.ca/
